stimulusHtml: Which of the following can be reasonably modeled by a normal distribution?
choicesHtml: The favorite colors of students in a kindergarten class
The heights of tomato plants that were all planted on the same day
The percent of employees from a company who attended a company retreat
The average number of siblings of all students at a particular high school
The parental guidance ratings (G, PG, PG-13, R) of movies filmed in 2019
